ITEM.Name: JUCE analytics classes
ITEM.Description: Classes to collect analytics and send to destinations.

ITEM.Name: JUCE audio and MIDI data classes
ITEM.Description: Classes for audio buffer manipulation, midi message handling, synthesis, etc.

ITEM.Name: JUCE audio and MIDI I/O device classes
ITEM.Description: Classes to play and record from audio and MIDI I/O devices.

ITEM.Name: JUCE audio file format codecs
ITEM.Description: Classes for reading and writing various audio file formats.

ITEM.Name: JUCE audio plugin wrapper classes
ITEM.Description: Classes for building VST, VST3, AudioUnit, AAX and RTAS plugins.

ITEM.Name: JUCE audio processor classes
ITEM.Description: Classes for loading and playing VST, AU, or internally-generated audio processors.

ITEM.Name: JUCE extra audio utility classes
ITEM.Description: Classes for audio-related GUI and miscellaneous tasks.

ITEM.Name: Provides low-level control over ROLI BLOCKS devices
ITEM.Description: JUCE wrapper for low-level control over ROLI BLOCKS devices.

ITEM.Name: JUCE wrapper for the Box2D physics engine
ITEM.Description: The Box2D physics engine and some utility classes.

ITEM.Name: JUCE core classes
ITEM.Description: The essential set of basic JUCE classes, as required by all the other JUCE modules.

ITEM.Name: JUCE cryptography classes
ITEM.Description: Classes for various basic cryptography functions, including RSA, Blowfish, MD5, SHA, etc.

ITEM.Name: JUCE data model helper classes
ITEM.Description: Classes for undo/redo management, and smart data structures.

ITEM.Name: JUCE DSP classes
ITEM.Description: Classes for audio buffer manipulation, digital audio processing, filtering, oversampling, fast math functions etc.

ITEM.Name: JUCE message and event handling classes
ITEM.Description: Classes for running an application's main event loop and sending/receiving messages, timers, etc.

ITEM.Name: JUCE graphics classes
ITEM.Description: Classes for 2D vector graphics, image loading/saving, font handling, etc.

ITEM.Name: JUCE GUI core classes
ITEM.Description: Basic user-interface components and related classes.

ITEM.Name: JUCE extended GUI classes
ITEM.Description: Miscellaneous GUI classes for specialised tasks.

ITEM.Name: JUCE OpenGL classes
ITEM.Description: Classes for rendering OpenGL in a JUCE window.

ITEM.Name: JUCE OSC classes
ITEM.Description: Open Sound Control implementation.

ITEM.Name: JUCE Online marketplace support
ITEM.Description: Classes for online product authentication.

ITEM.Name: JUCE video playback and capture classes
ITEM.Description: Classes for playing video and capturing camera input.
